entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Manicouagan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac Manouane East 12:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -29.9°C
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -33.3°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
